sect1.title: What does this plugin do?
sect1.para: This plugin combines functionalities of two other Geomajas projects: the Geomajas Graphics Project and the Geomajas Editing Plugin. Specifically, this plugin extends the editing functionalities of an object from the Graphics projects with the manipulations of the Editing Plugin.

An objects that is created are created via methods of the Geomajas Graphics Project, can be manipulated The Graphics Editing plugin allows for manipulation of objects that are created in Graphics project with manipulation tools of the Editing plugin.
Currently this plugin comprises one extra functionality:

listitem.para: Point-by-point modification of the shape of the Graphics object. This also includes adding and deleting points.
